channel.title: Giving my rs acc and rsgp to whoever can help me set up my server
channel.description: giving away rs acc m1 c3llan30u and his items/rsgp to whoever can remote connect and set up my server for me

item.title: Giving my rs acc and rsgp to whoever can help me set up my server
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

USE YOUTUBE OR SEARCH ON GOOGLE!

(sorry for the caps, i am just upset that he didn’t look on Google or YouTube for such a basic thing.)

Read full topic
item.source: Giving my rs acc and rsgp to whoever can help me set up my server

item.title: Giving my rs acc and rsgp to whoever can help me set up my server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You don’t need somebody to connect to your PC to help set up a server for you. Last I checked there were 2-3 decent guides in the tutorial section that help newcomers do this, I’d recommend that you give them a try. You may also be interested in finding a tutorial on how to port forward also, so take your time to look through a tutorial on that too.

Also, just as a side note, remove your reward offer. Help is free here at Moparscape, and it is against our rules to offer a reward in exchange for services.

Read full topic
item.source: Giving my rs acc and rsgp to whoever can help me set up my server

item.title: Giving my rs acc and rsgp to whoever can help me set up my server
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“thomashawkins1991, post:10, topic:506814”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=625047.msg4255760#msg4255760 date=1362721222]

they know it is! no one is totally stupid! so why post?>>> purposely acting stupid and illiterate? why try to start altercation?<> get for-real dude is asking for help not the rules?

What are these random less-than and greater-than signs for? Anyways, if he knew, then he wouldn’t have posted this, would he? Please use some common sense for a change. Regardless, if you wish to continue this discussion, private message me as opposed to our continuation of thread spam.
[/quote]
lol (if he knew, then he wouldn’t have posted this,) more n likely he did but don’t care?[/quote]
Let’s let this thread die peacefully.

Read full topic

now if i said something like this i done be muted!!!***** this is bs lol!

What was the point in even posting this?

what was the point in u posting its against the rules?>> << cause its there and its the truth i would have done been muted! ***
check ur messages i told u i help u?>><<

What’s the point in me posting that it’s against the rules? To warn him so he does not break the same rule again in the future. What’s your excuse?[/quote]
